sen.j: その帰途の夜、遠江国小笠郡塩買坂（現在の静岡県菊川市）で横地氏と勝間田氏の残党による一揆に不意を襲われた。
sen.e: On the way back, he was caught in the uprising by the Yokochi and Katsumada clan remnants at 塩買坂, Ogasa County, Totoumi Province (present-day Kikugawa City, Shizuoka Prefecture) at night.
sen.cmt: 「塩買坂」「横地」「勝間田」の読み方不明
sen.e: On the way back, he was caught in the uprising by the Yokochi and Katsumata clan remnants at Shiokaizaka, Ogasa County, Totomi Province (present-day Kikugawa City, Shizuoka Prefecture) at night.
sen.cmt: Totoumi→Totomi、the Katsumada clan→the Katsumata clanに修正、塩買坂→Shikaizakaとしました。(参考: http://hata0913.hp.infoseek.co.jp/matunaga-1.htm)
sen.e: On the way back, he was caught in the uprising by the Yokochi and Katsumata clan remnants at Shiokaizaka, Ogasa County, Totomi Province (present-day Kikugawa City, Shizuoka Prefecture) at night.

sen.j: 義忠は馬に乗って指揮をとるが、流れ矢に当たって討ち死した。
sen.e: Yoshitada spearheaded on the horse, but was killed by a stray arrow.
Yoshitada spearheaded on the horse, but was killed by a stray arrow.
Yoshitada spearheaded on the horse, but was killed by a stray arrow.

sen.j: 義忠の不慮の死により、僅か6歳の龍王丸が残された。
sen.e: His untimely death left Tatsu-o-maru who was only six years old.
His untimely death left Tatsuomaru who was only six years old.
His untimely death left Tatsuomaru who was only six years old.

sen.j: この後、今川氏は一族の小鹿範満が家督継承を主張して内紛状態になった。
sen.e: Norimitsu Oshika from the Imagawa family demanded to take over the family estate of the Imagawa clan, and the internal conflict arose.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Norimitsu OSHIKA from the Imagawa family demanded to take over the family estate of the Imagawa clan, and the internal conflict arose.
sen.cmt: Norimitsu Oshika→Norimitsu OSHIKAに修正しました。
sen.e: Norimitsu OSHIKA from the Imagawa family demanded to take over the family estate of the Imagawa clan, and the internal conflict arose.

sen.j: それを調停するために北川殿の兄弟であり幕府申次衆の伊勢盛時が駿河国へ下向している。
sen.e: Kitagawa-dono's brother Moritoki ISE, a messenger of the bakufu, went to Suruga Province as a mediator.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kitagawa-dono's brother Moritoki ISE, a messenger of the bakufu, went to Suruga Province as a mediator.
Kitagawa-dono's brother Moritoki ISE, a messenger of the bakufu, went to Suruga Province as a mediator.

sen.j: このことが、盛時と今川氏との絆を強め、後の盛時の関東地方進出と後北条氏誕生の契機になる。
sen.e: Then the relationship between Moritoki and the Imagawa clan became closer, which later triggered Moritoki's foray on Kanto region and the birth of the Gohojo clan.
Then the relationship between Moritoki and the Imagawa clan became closer, which later triggered Moritoki's foray into the Kanto region and the birth of the Gohojo clan.
sen.cmt: foray on Kanto region→foray into the Kanto regionとしました。
sen.e: Then the relationship between Moritoki and the Imagawa clan became closer, which later triggered Moritoki's foray into the Kanto region and the birth of the Gohojo clan.
